mapper.select: SELECT person.studentid,person.name,event.name,event.location,event.start_time,event.end_time,event.type, event.size,event.remark,event.organizer,activity.evaluation from person,event,activity WHERE person.pid = activity.pid AND activity.eid = event.eid and person.name = #{name};
